snippet.title: Minecraft: Better Together Update is now live! Togetherness ACTIVATED!
snippet.description: We’ve fused many Minecrafts into one Minecraft so you can play with more friends in more places. With the Better Together update, you can join up with friends playing on phone, Windows 10 or console, or jump onto one of the massive community-run server directly from the game itself! Get the update for free today. Read more: https://minecraft.net/en-us/article/better-together-update-here
